content: crochet cat pillow abbreviations *this pattern is written in us materials needed 200 yards terms of jumbo yarn i used sweet chain= chain snuggles by loops & threads single_crochet= single_crochet black yarn for embroidered half_double_crochet= half_double_crochet face double_crochet= double_crochet 8mm hook treble_crochet= treble/triple crochet stuffing slip_stitch = slip_stitch yarn needle increase= increase scissors notes you are welcome to sell any items gauge is not too important just make made from this pattern but you may not sure you have a good gauge you claim the pattern as your own can recreate this pattern with any hook or yarn size yarn under - this will make your stitches look tighter however it s a personal choice so do what you are comfortable with body of pillow make 2 ears make 2 note the chain 2 in the beginning does not count as a stitch chain 5 row 1 in a magic_ring half_double_crochet 8 slip_stitch in the first half_double_crochet to row 1 treble_crochet in second chain join 8 row 2 chain 2 increase in each stitch around slip_stitch to join from the hook double_crochet half_double_crochet scx2 16 row 3 chain 2 half_double_crochet 1 increase x8 repeat throughout slip_stitch in the final chain continue to join 24 crocheting along the bottom row 4 chain 2 half_double_crochet 2 increase x8 slip_stitch to join 32 row 5 chain 2 half_double_crochet 3 increase x8 slip_stitch to join 40 of the chain 5 row 6 chain 2 half_double_crochet 4 increase x8 slip_stitch to join 48 row 7 chain 2 half_double_crochet 5 increase x8 slip_stitch to join 56 single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet row 8 chain 2 half_double_crochet 6 increase x8 slip_stitch to join 64 row 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet in the row 9 chain 2 half_double_crochet 7 increase x8 slip_stitch to join 72 row 10 chain 2 half_double_crochet 8 increase x8 slip_stitch to join 80 next 4 stitches single_crochet 3 in next row 11 half_double_crochet in each stitch across 80 finish off stitch single_crochet in the next 4 stitches ** once you have completed the second one do not row 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet in the finish off instead grab both pieces with the right sides facing towards each other stitch them together by next 6 stitches scx3 in next doing a single_crochet join until there is only enough space for your hand to fit though then gently pull stitch single_crochet in the final 6 stitches from the inside out so the single_crochet will be on the inside finish off and sew to the pillow add embroidered face and then stuff and sew the remaining gap closed
